files.patch:
@@ -1377,4 +1377,5 @@
-  // rbx now holds the exception handler.
-  // Prepare for its invocation; see OptoRuntime::generate_exception_blob.
-  __ pop(rax); // exception oop
-  __ pop(rdx); // exception pc
+  // Continue at exception handler:
+  //   rax: exception oop
+  //   rbx: exception handler
+  //   rdx: exception pc
+  __ pop(rax);
@@ -1382,0 +1383,1 @@
+  __ pop(rdx);

@@ -7594,5 +7594,8 @@
-      // rbx now holds the exception handler.
-      // Prepare for its invocation; see OptoRuntime::generate_exception_blob.
-      __ pop(rax); // exception oop
-      __ pop(rbp);
-      __ pop(rdx); // exception pc
+      // Continue at exception handler:
+      //   rax: exception oop
+      //   rbx: exception handler
+      //   rdx: exception pc
+      __ pop(rax);
+      __ verify_oop(rax);
+      __ pop(rbp); // pop out RBP here too
+      __ pop(rdx);

@@ -268,0 +268,12 @@
+jdk_loom = \
+    com/sun/management/HotSpotDiagnosticMXBean/ \
+    java/lang/Thread \
+    java/lang/ThreadGroup \
+    java/lang/management/ThreadMXBean \
+    java/util/concurrent \
+    java/net/vthread \
+    java/nio/channels/vthread \
+    jdk/internal/misc/ThreadFlock \
+    jdk/internal/vm/Continuation \
+    jdk/jfr/threading
+
